Please Sir, Can I have some more?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Items: Please Sir, Can I have some more?
By Princess Behemoth on Thursday, April 8, 2004 - 09:29 am:

When I was training Kraken(golem/jell) when the weirdest thing happened. When I was feeding it it asked for more food. I didn't because he was already spoiled. Looking though the archive and not finding anything on it made me wonder if this was common or not?

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, April 8, 2004 - 10:00 am:

It happens a lot with large monsters: Golem, Zilla, Baku, etc. In general, I would feed the food, in order to get the stress reduction. -Just make sure to calculate the effects into your method.
